title: Drawing, "Phaeton Bidding Apollo Farewell", ca. 1810
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and colored washes over black chalk on textured paper
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Phaeton holding reins and with left foot in chariot, turns backward to Apollo, seated to admonish him. Aurora flies below at right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Phaeton Bidding Apollo Farewell", ca. 1810.
ca. 1810. Pen and brown ink, brush and colored washes over black chalk on textured paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3287.
